results.title: Playboy number one
results.brief_description: Off-beat comedy, set aboard a cruise ship, revolving around a french teacher (Willie Howard), and his attempt to find a girlfriend. Cast includes Janet Reade, Louis Sorin, Ruth Leavitt, Charles Slattery, Abe Bronson, Joseph De Villard.

results.title: Play with Natural Materials (TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Structuring Play in the Infant School No.5”.
Children’s play with natural materials appears to be divided into sensory, imaginative and exploratory play. Shows teachers harnessing the fascination that natural materials have for young children

results.title: Play to learn
results.creator_credit: Peter Jones, ONF | NFB and Joe Bas
results.brief_description: This film shows how Julius Erdelyi, a teacher at Woodlands School, New Westminster, prepares children for real-life situations outside the classroom - walking through downtown traffic, for instance. He brings in actual traffic lights and follows this up with field trips. The children suffer from varying degrees of being mentally handicapped, but they all obviously welcome such opportunities to learn and grow.

results.title: Play snooker with Dennis Taylor
results.brief_description: Former world champion, Dennis Taylor, covers every aspect of this popular indoor sport. Dennis insists that you must start the right way: understand the rules, find the right cue and take care of it, stand and hold the cue correctly and know when and how to use rests and extensions. And, once you’ve got started, then it is time to learn how to pot, how to control the cue ball, how to play difficult shots and how to develop strategies and tactics.

results.title: Play School: Everybody Sing!
results.creator_credit: Henrietta Clark and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description: ‘Everybody Sing!’ is a one hour special presentation exploring the world of music, sound and making music and contains 33 terrific songs including Miss Polly had a Dolly, Der Glumph went the Little Green Frog, Three Jelly Fish, The Toothbrush Song, The Wobbly Walk, The Bear Hunt, Goldilocks - The Musical, Baa Baa Black Sheep and lots more. Presenters include Colin Buchanan, Benita Collings, Trisha Goddard, John Hamblin, Noni Hazlehurst, Angela Moore, Philip Quast, George Spartels, Monica Trapaga.

results.title: Play School. The road show
results.brief_description: Five Play School presenters sing songs, tell stories and play games about cars, buses and bikes - and about how to be safe on the road. Presenters include Benita Collings, John Hamblin, Noni Hazelhurst, Simon Burke, George Spartels.

results.title: Play School. the All Together Show; at the Zoo
results.brief_description: The “All together show” is a delightful compilation of well known Play school songs and stories produced by seven well loved Play school presenters - Benita Collings, John Hambelin, Noni Hazelhurst, Jan Kinsbury, Alistair Smart, Don Spencer and John Waters. In “At the zoo” Play school visits Sydney’s Taronga Zoo. Jan Kinsbury, Elaine Hudson and Don Spencer look at the monkeys, chimpanzees, giraffes, lions and seals, as well as a rabbit, a turtle, a baby kangaroo and the animals at the Zoo’s Friendship farm.
